website_summaries.verdict: Nike offers stylish casual kick fitting for the warmer days. The new Nike Sock Dart SE Premium brags about its sock-like textile upper for that cooling comfort complemented with lightweight foam cushioning for an amplified coziness.This low-top kick has a stylish translucent strap over the midfoot, is offered in various colorways that can be personalized through the NikeiD technology. No wonder, the ultra-comfortable and minimalist fashion of the Nike Sock Dart SE Premium is one of the most vouched for sneakers by the experts.
pros: The Nike Sock Dart SE Premium is available at an average price point
This pair is very comfortable, many users have experienced
The Sock Dart SE Premium is perfect for daily casual use, many users have said
The majority of buyers commend the tasteful and futuristic design of this pair
Highly recommendable pair, most users have revealed
NikeiD technology is available for the Nike Sock Dart SE Premium
It allows the buyers to personalize their shoe
Many reviewers commend the easiness to slip this sneaker on and off
cons: A reviewer complains that the sockliner of Nike Sock Dart SE Premium is not removable

customer_reviews.title: Great daily use shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as my Casual shoe for family trips #dadshoe, specifically when sandals or a dress shoe are not warranted. I live in Asia so these are nice because I have to constantly take off my shoes when going indoors. I have worked out in theme once or twice but prefer laced shoes for that. They provide enough support for being on your feet all day or chasing down a sprinting toddler but I wouldn't run any sort of race in them. I added so Dr. Schols inserts to them, now they fit like a glove feels like I am walking on air
customer_reviews.author: Sir Roderick

customer_reviews.title: The Nike Sock Dart Shoes: Fits just like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: If you have the chance to get these things, especially if theyre on sale, and youre unsure about whether or not you should get them, do it. Theyre amazing. Sole is extremely comfortable and the upper fits the name. Its just like a sock. Some people here say theyre not durable, but I accidentally took mine on a hike (forgot my other shoes at home) and they held up. No rips or snags. I was never sure about these until I got a pair. They're incredible. If you order a size 13, you get a perfect fitting size 13. These usually go for $90-150, I was extremely lucky to find them for $35 on here brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Adam B. Bugay

customer_reviews.title: Socks or shoes?
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I am very happy with these shoes. I do not run in them but use them as a casual shoe. I know that Nike's tend to run small on the size chart so I always order a half size larger. I love that they just slip on, they are comfortable, and airy. I never wear socks with them and they do not bother my feet at all. I also get some nice comments on the look and color of these Nikes's. This is the second pair that I have and the only thing that I don't like it that they are a bit pricey for me.
customer_reviews.author: dominick mosco

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and great price
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable and stylish if you know what to wear with them. I wasn't sure about buying them from this seller on amazon because I didn't want to get fake shoes. But they were $30 less than the ones on Foot Locker, Eastbay and etc. so I had to take the chance. But they are real and not some cheap knock offs. I personally love them because they fit my style. I would recommend these to anyone who wants comfortable shoes. I have over 30 different pairs of shoes and these are in my top 5 of most comfortable along side my Adria's ultra boost and yeezy 350.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. The only thing to avoid is if you are going to walk sideways on a slanted surface. Your feet will roll inside the shoes. But everything else these shoes are perfect
customer_reviews.author: D mas

customer_reviews.title: good for your feet.
customer_reviews.text: adapts to your odd foot shape. comfy. easy to put on if you have limitations in reaching your feet. pull on with heel so as not to crush. go ahead and wear socks. excellent even for somewhat wider feet. not constricting so healthy for my foot. NOT a running shoe because they let your foot move around a lot (stability). i recommend giving them a rey. colors are great!
customer_reviews.author: Texas T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoe for your DISCOVERY workout!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these since 2017 and they still look new. They are very comfortable and look great. They are perfect for a DISCOVERY workout. Shoes are true to size and easy on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: B K Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and easy to put on with one hand
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable and easy to put on. I wouldn’t call them a running shoe though? I bought them for the no lace easy to slip-on design, so they met my expectation👍 I just had shoulder surgery. All in all a win for me and could be for anyone purchasing the shoe for the right reason(s)
customer_reviews.author: frank thomsen

customer_reviews.title: They run big so you may think about a 1/2 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: They run big so you might want to get a size or a half size down. I wear a size 10 and they feel noticeably bigger, but I have a size 9 in the same shoe and the good thing about them is they can stretch!
customer_reviews.author: Jfly21

customer_reviews.title: Nike Men's Sock Dart SE Racer Blue/Racer My Go To the Gym Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Nike Men's Sock Dart SE Racer Blue/Racer has met all my expectations for a reasonable price. It is my go to the gym shoe. The shoe provides great support for my feet whether you're on the treadmill, the stationary bike or doing resistance training with free weights or on the machines. Easy on, easy off.
customer_reviews.author: DEXTER COCHNAUER

customer_reviews.title: Hard to strap on
customer_reviews.text: Wore them dozen times or so and just getting the knack on the closures the strap is a webbing type you have to get it just right for the pins to catch through the holes in the webbing kinda frustrating woukd wear them more if not soo hard to secure
customer_reviews.author: jchcn9

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for swollen feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on vacation because I had a gout flare up (the first time it has ever happened) and none of my shoes fit. These shoes are very comfortable and the perfect solution! I love the design and they draw lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: poohbc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit but you'll likely have to replace the non-supporting ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit but you'll likely have to replace the non-supporting insole ~ thus the four stars. Very comfortable, lightweight and better quality than recent Nike purchases.
customer_reviews.author: J Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Read all about it
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes, but too big I did t realize that men’s sizes were so much larger. I’m re ordering in smaller size.

customer_reviews.text: Awesome design, you have to buy one size bigger if you are planning to buy this.

customer_reviews.title: Is it a sock?  Is it a shoe?  Is it a sh-ock?  No, it's a soe.
customer_reviews.text: Traded back a pair of 12s for some 13s. Much less tight on my Flintstone-feet. Good slip on for low kinetic work/desk jobs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but mesh is hard to reconnect
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. What i didn't care for originally was the plastic web material on the top. I thought this was to be used every time the shoe was was to adjust fit, like laces or Velcro. I undid the fasteners to adjust the fit and had to use pliers to reconnect them. Once I got them reconnected, I realized they are not meant to be used every time you wear the shoe. Now that I have them adjusted to my feet, the shoes fit well and I can slip them on while the mesh is closed. Other than that, very comfortable walking and everyday wear shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
